physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Movements of the right hand and fingers were slower and less precise than those of the left hand and fingers. The remainder of the physical examination was normal.

physical_examinations.date: 25 days after initiation of ipilimumab and nivolumab therapy
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Examination of the lungs revealed crackles in both bases. The remainder of the examination was normal.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Oxygen saturation decreased significantly from 97% to 48%.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: On examination, the abdomen was soft and nontender, without rebound or guarding.

Bilateral facial weakness, with poor resistance to eyelid closure. Grip strength diminished in both arms, particularly the right. Reflexes were absent at the ankles, patellae, biceps, and brachioradialis tendons.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weakness in the legs and arms progressed over time.
